name: The 11th International Conference on New Ideas in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: The 11th International Conference on New Ideas in Management, Economics and Accounting will take place on the 17th-19th of February 2023 in the spectacular city of Barcelona, Spain. Once again bringing together a diverse audience of academics, scholars, members of non-profit and research organizations, as well as representatives of government agencies, IMEACONF is an event with a rich history and a reputation for excellence. It’s a fantastic opportunity to learn about the latest trends in the field, discuss your research findings, and network with your peers. You will also have a chance to discover the fascinating culture and architecture of Barcelona, try out the local cuisine, and discover the city’s hidden gems as every attendee is invited to join a free walking tour. Barcelona is the 11th location of the event. Previous editions took place in Hungary, Austria, France, Italy, Spain, Singapore, Germany, and Iran. We look forward to seeing many returning faces and welcoming new attendees at IMEACONF 2023.
